ygData.subject: RE: Re: Hi Everyone
ygData.msgSnippet: Someone said Kelethin is good for pottery (everything is there in the tree city but┬áyou do have to do some running.)┬á You dont really need the pottery book
ygData.messageBody:
Someone said Kelethin is good for pottery (everything is there in the tree
city but´┐¢you do have to do some running.)´┐¢ You dont really need the pottery
book if you get the information from a couple trade skill sites.´┐¢ Don't have
access to my link list here but it's easily found folowing links off the
major EQ sites:´┐¢ egvault, eq stratics, eqlyzer, etc.
´┐¢
Sylly - the bard - level 14 now.

-----Original Message-----
From: Tanthalias [mailto:tanthalas@...]
Sent: Sunday, July 11, 1999 11:26 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Hi Everyone


I've been twisting songs ever since I got Hymn of Restoration. It really
comes in handy when you start to get into trouble in a fight and you can
twist Hymn with Chant of Battle or Jonathon's Whistling Warsong. Now that
you have Boastful Bellow, you really need to start twisting that with Anthem
De Arms or Hymn, whichever the situation. Start out twisting Bellow with
Anthem, then if your hitpoints start getting low, twist Bellow with Hymn,
and throw Anthem in there just for good measure if you can.
´┐¢
Maybe I'll try pottery to make some extra money. I've been doing brewing for
awhile, and that you can maybe make 5-10pp in an hour, and it gets very
tedious. Its not really practical for me to go to Halas right now, I'm in
Freeport. Where is a good place to do pottery on the eastern coast of
Antonica or anywhere on Faydwer? Also, where can I get the book on pottery?
´┐¢
´┐¢Tanthalias
´┐¢Half Elven Bard, 12th Circle
´┐¢Tarew Marr
